basics.name: Christopher Thomas
basics.label: Computer Scientist
basics.summary: Chris graduated from Montana State University in December 2017 and is a computer scientist interested in modern web applications and systems administration.

work.summary: Provided technical support to students and staff in person, over the phone, and on site at offices and residencies. Developed web applications, and services.
highlights: Developed web applications and scripts to streamline common help desk problems and improve communication with customers
Diagnosed and repaired hardware and software of a large variety of devices

work.summary: Developed and prototyped internal mobile application and web application in a small group.
highlights: Developed a mobile application using web technologies and Ionic/Apache Cordova
Developed an API and management web application using the Laravel MVC Framework

work.summary: Developed a new website and subscription service for violinist Julia Fischer.
highlights: Developed a web application using Sinatra on Ruby
Developed a design with the client using Bootstrap, SASS, jQuery and other technologies
Created an asset pipeline to manage javascript and CSS
Integrated with Stripe to handle subscriptions and payments

awards.title: College of Letters and Science Dean's List
